adept.common

Class ScriptVariableBinaryConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.common.Item
      • adept.common.HltContent
        • adept.common.ScriptVariableBinaryConstraint

  • public final class ScriptVariableBinaryConstraint
extends HltContent
    A constraint which holds between two variables in an event script. For example, the time variable for a conviction event may be constrained to be after the time variable for an indictment event. The semantics of the constraint are specified by the constraint type, which must be interpreted by the application. All script-related classes are "locally immutable" so long as the IType implementation used is. However, they all inherit from the mutable HltContent class, whose associated fields are mutable. The Object.hashCode() and Object.equals(Object) implementations are the default.
